TASK.TITLE: Installation of the Door Locking Mechanism Door M4L/M4R

WARNING.PARA: BEFORE YOU START WORK, YOU MUST PUT ON A SAFETY HARNESS AND ATTACH IT TO THE ACCESS PLATFORM. WITHOUT A SAFETY HARNESS, YOU CAN FALL. THIS CAN KILL YOU OR CAUSE YOU INJURY.

L1ITEM.PARA: Fixtures, Tools, Test and Support Equipment

ENTRY.PARA: MAIN DECK PASSENGER/CREW DOOR M4L, LH
MAIN DECK PASSENGER/CREW DOOR M4R, RH
Electrical Bonding of Components with Conductive Screws and Bolts and Bonding Straps
Energize the Aircraft Electrical Circuits from the External Power Receptacles 2, 3, 1 and 4
Energize the Aircraft Electrical Circuits from the APU (APU Started with the APU Battery)
Energize the Aircraft Electrical Circuits from the External Power Receptacles 2, 3 and 1
Energize the Aircraft Electrical Circuits from the APU (APU Started with the External Power Receptacles 1 and 3)
De-energize the Aircraft Electrical Circuits from the External Power Receptacles 4, 1, 3 and 2
De-energize the Aircraft Electrical Circuits from the APU
De-energize the Aircraft Electrical Circuits from the External Power Receptacles 1, 3 and 2
Removal of the Main-Deck Door Linings
Installation of the Main-Deck Door Linings
Removal and Installation of the Insulation Material
Functional Test of the Passenger/Crew Doors M1L/M1R, M2L/M2R, M4L/M4R, M5L/M5R
Adjustment of the Passenger/Crew Doors M4L/M4R
Special Precautions before Work on the Passenger/Crew Door
Special Precautions after Work on the Passenger/Crew Door
Installation of the Door Support Arm, Door Bumper, Door Stay Bracket, Lining Brackets, Guide Arms and the Guide Arm Hinge-Fitting Door M4L/M4R
Adjustment of the Door Locking Mechanism Door M4L/M4R
Adjustment of the Emergency Escape Slide Release Mechanism on Door M4L/M4R
Installation of the Proximity Sensors of the Passenger/Crew Door M4
Adjustment of the Proximity Sensors of the Passenger/Crew Door M4

PARA.GRPHCREF: Inner and Outer Door Operation Handle

L2ITEM.PARA: Make sure that the access platform is in position.
Make sure that the aircraft electrical circuits are energized
Make sure that the special precautions are done before you work on the door 52-10-00-860-80152-10-00-860-801-A.
Make sure that the passenger crew door is open 52-10-00-010-80152-10-00-010-801-A and the sling 98L52008592000SLING-UNIVERSAL,DOORS is installed 52-10-00-940-80152-10-00-940-801-A.
Make sure that the slide raft is removed 25-62-41-000-80125-62-41-000-801-A.
Make sure that the door linings 25-23-53-000-80125-23-53-000-801-A are removed.
Make sure that the thermal insulation and sound insulation 25-80-00-910-80225-80-00-910-802-A is removed.

WARNING.PARA: USE SOLVENTS/CLEANING AGENTS, SEALANTS AND OTHER SPECIAL MATERIALS ONLY WITH A GOOD FLOW OF AIR THROUGH THE WORK AREA.
THESE MATERIALS ARE POISONOUS AND FLAMMABLE AND SKIN IRRITANTS.
OBEY THE MANUFACTURERS INSTRUCTIONS.
PUT ON PROTECTIVE CLOTHING.
DO NOT GET THEM IN YOUR MOUTH.
DO NOT SMOKE.
DO NOT BREATHE THE GAS.
GET MEDICAL HELP IF YOUR SKIN OR EYES BECOME IRRITATED.

L2ITEM.PARA: Clean the component interface and/or the adjacent area.
Do a visual inspection of the component interface and/or the adjacent area.
Make sure that the parts retained from the removed component are clean and in the correct condition.
Remove the remaining sealant from the fittings, brackets, flanges and the structure. Use a SCRAPER - NON METALLIC.

WARNING.PARA: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE MATERIAL No. 11-004.
OBEY THE MATERIAL MANUFACTURER'S INSTRUCTIONS.

L2ITEM.PARA: Clean the contact area of the fittings and the structure with CLEANING AGENTS (11004*).

WARNING.PARA: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE MATERIAL No. 04-004.
OBEY THE MATERIAL MANUFACTURER'S INSTRUCTIONS.

L2ITEM.PARA: Apply COMMON GREASE (04004*) to all parts that move, but this does not include the PTFE bushes.

WARNING.PARA: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE MATERIAL No. 05-002.
OBEY THE MATERIAL MANUFACTURER'S INSTRUCTIONS.

L2ITEM.PARA: Apply SPECIAL MATERIALS (05002*) to the shafts of the bolts, but this does not include the bolts installed on the shock-mounts.
Install the levers (49, 53) and the rod (57) (Refer to detail F):

L3ITEM.PARA: Put the bush (50) and the levers (49) in position and install the washers (51,48), the bolt (52) and the nut (47).
Put the other end of the levers (49) in position and install the washers (35), the bolts (55) and the nuts (56).

Put the lever (53) in position and install the washers (32, 33) as recorded during the removal procedure, Install the bolt (31), the washer (30) and the nut (29). Safety the nut (49) with the 52132102-100cotter pin28.
Put the rod (57) in position and install the washers (35), the bolts (54) and the nuts (36). Safety the nuts (36) with the 52132102-280cotter pin37.

L2ITEM.PARA: Install the lever assembly (40, 44) (Refer to detail C and E):

L3ITEM.PARA: Put the lever (40) in position and install the washers (32, 33) as recorded during the removal procedure and install the bolt (31), the washer (30) and the nut (29). Safety the nut (29) with the 52132102-100cotter pin28.
Put the rod (38) in position and install the washers (35), the bolts (34) and the nuts (36). Safety the nuts (36) with the 52132102-280cotter pin37.
Put the lever (44) in position as recorded during the removal procedure and install the pin (39), the washers (41, 42) and the 52132102-280cotter pin43.
Put the lever (44) together with the bush (46) in position on the bracket (22) and install the washers (35), the bolt (45) and the nut (36). Safety the nut (36) with the 52132102-280cotter pin37.

L2ITEM.PARA: Install the hinge arms (4, 25) and the cover assembly (1) (Refer to detail C and D):

L3ITEM.PARA: Put the hinge arms (4, 25) in position and install the washers (5, 6), the bolts (2) and the nuts (7). Safety the nuts (7) with the 52132115-460cotter pins8.
Put the bush (18), the washers (16) and the cover plate (1) in position and install the washers (11), the bolts (12) and the nuts (10). Safety the nuts (10) with the 52132115-520cotter pins9.
Install the washers (21) and the bolts (20).
Put the brackets (15, 19, 26) in position and install the washers (14) and the bolts (13).

L1ITEM.PARA: Installation of the Lower and Upper Connection Link

L2ITEM.PARA: Install the lower connection link (28) (Refer to detail D and E):

L3ITEM.PARA: Put the brackets (31, 32) in position and install the screws (33).

Install the bush (34) in the depth recorded during the removal procedure. Install the fork fitting (35), the washer (36), and the nut (37). Safety the nut (37) with the cotter pin (38). Put the tabwasher (30) in position and safety the bush (34) with the bolt (29). Safety the bolt (29) with the tabwasher (30).

Put the connection link (28) and the washers (58, 24, 25, 26, 27) as recorded during the removal procedure in position and install the shaft (23), the washer (57) the tabwasher (56), and the bolt (55). Safety the bolt (55) with the tabwasher (56).

Put the bonding straps (40, 43) in position on the connection link (28) and install the washers (42), the bolt (41) and the nut (44). Put the bonding strap (40) in position on the structure and install the washers (18), the bolt (17) and the nut (39). Put the bonding strap (43) in position on the bracket (31) and install the washer (42) and the bolt (51). Do the electrical bonding 20-28-00-912-80320-28-00-912-803-A.
Put the rod (47) in position and install the washers (46, 48), the bolts (45) and the nuts (49). Safety the nuts (49) with the 52132107-180cotter pins50.
Install the bracket in the area of lower connection link (Refer to paragraph K. detail V).

L2ITEM.PARA: Install the upper connection Link (8) (Refer to detail C and D):

L3ITEM.PARA: Install the washer (12), the fork fitting (15), the washer (11), and the nut (10). Safety the nut (10) with the cotter pin (9).

Put the connection link (8) and the washers (4, 5) in position as recorded during the removal procedure and install the bolts (7), the washers (3) and the nuts (2). Safety the nuts (2) with the 52132107-180cotter pins1.

Put the brackets (13, 14) and the bonding strap (16) in position and install the washer (20) and the screw (22). Put the bonding straps (16, 19) in position and install the washers (18, 20) and the bolts (17, 21). Do the electrical bonding 20-28-00-912-80320-28-00-912-803-A.
Install the bracket in the area of the lower connection link (Refer to paragraph K. detail L).
Install the door support arm 52-13-12-400-80152-13-12-400-801-A.

L1ITEM.PARA: Installation of the Outer and the Inner Door-Operation Handle Mechanism

PARA.GRPHCREF: Inner and Outer Door Operation Handle

L2ITEM.PARA: Install the flap (110) on the outer door-operation handle (73) (Refer to detail F):

L3ITEM.PARA: Install the axle (106) and the locksprings (105) on the flap (110).
Put the roller (108) and the washer (109) in position and install the axis (107), the washer (102) and the nut (101).
Safety the nut (101) with the new 52132104-360cotter pin100.
Make sure that the upper nut (103) is in position as recorded during the removal procedure.
Put the flap (110) in position and install the axis (104), the washers (102) and the nuts (101).
Safety the nuts (101) with the new 52132104-350cotter pins100.
Install the lower nut (103).

WARNING.PARA: USE GOGGLES WHEN YOU REMOVE OR INSTALL LOCKWIRE. EACH TIME YOU CUT LOCKWIRE, REMOVE AND DISCARD IT IMMEDIATELY. LOOSE LOCKWIRE CAN CAUSE INJURY AND/OR DAMAGE.

L3ITEM.PARA: Safety the nuts (103) with LOCKWIRE STAINLESS STEEL ANNEALED 0.8MM DIA (19010*).

L2ITEM.PARA: Install the outer door-operation handle (73) (Refer to detail E):

WARNING.PARA: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE MATERIAL No. 09-018.
OBEY THE MATERIAL MANUFACTURER'S INSTRUCTIONS.

L3ITEM.PARA: Apply a layer of SEALANTS (09018B) to the mating surface of the flange (74).

WARNING.PARA: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE MATERIAL No. 04-004.
OBEY THE MATERIAL MANUFACTURER'S INSTRUCTIONS.

L3ITEM.PARA: Apply COMMON GREASE (04004*) to the new O-ring (83) and install it. TBD
Put the levers (71) and (72) in position on the shaft (78) as recorded during the removal procedure.
Install the flange (74), the outer door-operation handle (73) and the shaft (78).
Install the washers (76), the bolts (77) and the nuts (75).
Install the washer (58), the tabwasher (57) and the bolt (56).
Safety the bolt (56) with the tabwasher (57).

WARNING.PARA: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE MATERIAL No. 09-018.
OBEY THE MATERIAL MANUFACTURER'S INSTRUCTIONS.

L3ITEM.PARA: Apply a layer of SEALANTS (09018B) to the mating surface of the bearing flange (61).
Put the inner washers (59) and (60) in position as recorded during the removal procedure.
Install the bearing flange (61), the washers (63), the bolts (64) and the nuts (62).
Install the outer washers (60), (59) and (58), the tabwasher (57) and the bolt (56).
Safety the bolt (56) with the tabwasher (57).
Put the levers (71) and (72) in position as recorded during the removal procedure.
Install the tabwashers (36) and the bolts (37).
Safety the bolts (37) with the tabwashers (36).
Put the rod (68) in position and install the washers (67) and (69), the bolt (70) and the nut (66).
Safety the nut (66) with the new 52132102-280cotter pin65.

WARNING.PARA: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE MATERIAL No. 09-018.
OBEY THE MATERIAL MANUFACTURER'S INSTRUCTIONS.

Put the guide fitting (93) and the washers (94) and (95) in position and install the screws (98).
If removed, install the stop plate (96) and the screws (97).
Put the stop (91) in position and install the screw (92) and the nut (90).

Put the inner washers (33) and (34) in position and install the shaft (44).
Install the tabwashers (36) and the bolts (37).
Safety the bolts (37) with the tabwashers (36).
Install the outer washers (34), (33) and (32), the tabwasher (31) and the bolt (30).
Safety the bolt (30) with the tabwasher (31).

WARNING.PARA: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE MATERIAL No. 09-018.
OBEY THE MATERIAL MANUFACTURER'S INSTRUCTIONS.

L3ITEM.PARA: Apply a layer of SEALANTS (09018B) to the mating surface of the cover (85).

Put the rod (29) in position and install the washers (27) and (21), the bolts (28) and the nuts (25). Safety the nuts (25) with the new 52132106-230cotter pins20.
Put the rod (22) in position and install the washers (23) and (21), the bolt (24) and the nut (25).
Safety the nuts (25) with the new 52132106-230cotter pin20.
On the lever (39), install the roller (42), the pin (43), the washer (41) and the new 52132106-430cotter pin40.

WARNING.PARA: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE MATERIAL No. 09-018.
OBEY THE MATERIAL MANUFACTURER'S INSTRUCTIONS.

Put the plate (48) in position and install the washers (50) and the bolts (55) and (46).
Install the washers (16), (47), (17) and (50), the stop bolt (45) and the nut (19).

WARNING.PARA: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE MATERIAL No. 09-018.

Put the stop fitting (86) in its installation position and install the washers (87), the bolts (15) and the nuts (88).
Put the washers (16), (17) and (87) in position as recorded during the removal procedure.
Install the stop bolt (15) and the nut (88).

L3ITEM.PARA: Apply a layer of SEALANTS (09018*) to the mating surface of the bearing flange (31).
Install the shaft (8), the washers (30, 41) as recorded during the removal procedure and install the bearing flange (31). Install the washers (26), the bolts (25) and the nuts (28).
On the lever (32), install the bush (37, 36), the roller (35), the bolt (34), the washer (38) and the nut (39). Safety the nut (39) with the 52132114-460cotter pin40.
Install the lever (32), the washer (33) and the nut (3). Safety the nut (3) with the 52132114-050cotter pin2.
Put the lever (9) in position as recorded during the removal procedure and install the tabwasher (10) and the bolt (11). Safety the bolt (11) with the tabwasher (10).
Put the rod (1) in position and install the washers (4, 5), the bolts (6) and the nuts (3). Safety the nuts (3) with the 52132114-050cotter pins2.

WARNING.PARA: BE VERY CAREFUL WHEN YOU REMOVE OR INSTALL THE SPRING. BECAUSE THERE IS REMAINING TENSION IN THE SPRING, IT CAN CAUSE YOU INJURY.

L3ITEM.PARA: Install the spring (7).

L2ITEM.PARA: Install the torsion bar (25) (Refer to detail D):

WARNING.PARA: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE MATERIAL No. 09-018.
OBEY THE MATERIAL MANUFACTURER'S INSTRUCTIONS.

L3ITEM.PARA: Apply a layer of SEALANTS (09018*) to the mating surface of the flange (18), and the bearing flanges (20, 45).
Put the lever (22), the bearing flange (20) and the washers (21) in position as recorded during the removal procedure and install the pipe (19).
Install the washers (5), the bolts (7) and the nuts (1).
Install the tabwasher (23) and the bolt (24). Safety the bolt (24) with the tabwasher (23).
Put the flange (18) in position and install the washers (5), the bolts (7) and the nuts (1).

Install the torsion bar (25). Make sure that the markings on the torsion bar (25), the lever (33) and the torsion pipe (19) is in line. Do the pre-adjustment of the torsion spring 52-13-21-820-80152-13-21-820-801-A. Install the washers (30) and the locksprings (17, 29).
Put the bearing flange (45) in position and install the washers (5), the bolts (31, 44) and the nuts (1).
Install the washer (32), the lever (33) and the lockspring (34). Make sure that the markings on the torsion bar (25), the lever (33) and the torsion pipe (19) are in line.
Put the support bearings (26) in position and install the cable ties (27, 28).

Put the screw (39) in position on the bearing flange (45) and install the nuts (40, 41), the washer (42) and the nut (43). Put the screw (39) in position on the lever (33) and install the washers (37, 36), the pin (38) and the 52132113-360cotter pin35.

L2ITEM.PARA: Install the rod (16) and the stop (6) (Refer to detail B and C):

L3ITEM.PARA: Put the rod (16) in position and install the washers (13, 14), the bolts (15) and the nuts (12). Safety the nuts (12) with the 52132112-120cotter pins11.
Put the stop (6) in position and install the washers (2), the bolts (7) and the nuts (1). Install the pin (10) and the 52122113-240cotter pin8.
Put the stop bolt (4) in position as recorded during the removal procedure and install the washers (2, 5) and the nuts (1).

L2ITEM.PARA: Put the brackets (1, 4, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 14, 15, 19, 20, 21, 23, 24) in position and install the washers (2) and the bolts (3) (Refer to detail A, B, D, E, F, G, J, K, M, N, P, R and S).

L3ITEM.PARA: Torque the bolts (3) [0.37 , 0.48]m.daN / [32.74 , 42.48]lbf.in.

L2ITEM.PARA: Put the brackets (7, 13, 22, 25, 26, 37, 38) in position and install the washers (5) and the bolts (6) (Refer to detail C, H, Q, T, U, Y and Z).
Install the brackets (16, 18) (Refer to detail L).

WARNING.PARA: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE MATERIAL No. 09-018.
OBEY THE MATERIAL MANUFACTURER'S INSTRUCTIONS.
BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE MATERIAL No. 05-013.
OBEY THE MATERIAL MANUFACTURER'S INSTRUCTIONS.

L3ITEM.PARA: Apply a layer of SEALANTS (09018*) to the mating surface of the brackets (16, 18). Apply a layer of SPECIAL MATERIALS (05013*) on the door structure in the contact area of the brackets (16, 18).
Put the brackets (16, 18) in position and install the screws (17).

L2ITEM.PARA: Install the brackets (29, 36, 33) (Refer to detail V and W).

WARNING.PARA: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE MATERIAL No. 09-018.
OBEY THE MATERIAL MANUFACTURER'S INSTRUCTIONS.
BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE MATERIAL No. 05-013.
OBEY THE MATERIAL MANUFACTURER'S INSTRUCTIONS.

L3ITEM.PARA: Apply a layer of SEALANTS (09018*) on the mating surface of the bracket (27, 33). Apply a layer of SPECIAL MATERIALS (05013*) on the door structure in the contact area of the bracket (27 33).
Put the bracket (27, 33) in position and install the washers (29, 32), the bolts (30, 31) and the nuts (34). Put the bracket (39) in position and install the screws (28).

L2ITEM.PARA: Put the bracket (35) in position and install the washers (5) and the bolts (36) (Refer to detail X).
Do the adjustment of the door locking mechanism 52-13-21-820-80152-13-21-820-801-A.
Do the adjustment of the escape slide release mechanism 52-13-22-820-80152-13-22-820-801-A.
Do the adjustment of the door 52-10-00-820-80352-10-00-820-803-A.
Install the applicable sensors and/or targets 52-71-11-400-80752-71-11-400-807-A and do the adjustment of the proximity sensors 52-71-11-820-80652-71-11-820-806-A.
Do the functional test of the passenger/crew door M4L/M4R 52-10-00-720-80152-10-00-720-801-A.
Make sure that the work area is clean and clear of tools and other items.
Install the thermal insulation and sound isolation 25-80-00-910-80225-80-00-910-802-A.

L1ITEM.PARA: Put the aircraft back to its initial configuration.

L2ITEM.PARA: Do the special precaution after work on the door 52-10-00-860-80252-10-00-860-802-A.
Remove the ground support and maintenance equipment, the special and standard tools and all other items.
Remove the ACCESS PLATFORM(S).
De-energize the aircraft electrical circuits
